Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2009...
Injured on 9/4/2009 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/2011 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/8/2014 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/10/2015...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2015, going 3-0, 1.27...
Had first career hit on 5/6/2015, off Neil Broxton (SF)...
Injured on 5/15/2015 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2015, going 3-1, 0.66...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/2016 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 8 weeks...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2019, going 4-1, 1.43...
Injured on 7/21/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Colorado on 4/1/2020 (Going to LAN: P P. Schneider Jr., LF M. Buchholz, P M. Anderson, 3B C. Travis Jr.. Going to COL: P D. Hutchinson, RF G. Cooper)...
Struck out 16 batters against San Diego on 4/10/2022...
Struck out 15 batters against Milwaukee on 9/5/2022...
